net.ljcomputing.core.service

Class AbstractDomainEntityServiceImpl<T extends Domain,S extends PersistedEntity,ID extends Serializable,R extends BaseRepository<S,ID>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ljcomputing.core.service.AbstractDomainEntityServiceImpl<T,S,ID,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the Domain type
    S - the PersistedEntity type
    ID - the ID (entity id) type
    R - the repository type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DomainEntityService<T,S,ID,R>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityDomainEntityServiceImpl, EventDomainEntityServiceImpl, WbsDomainEntityServiceImpl

    public abstract class AbstractDomainEntityServiceImpl<T extends Domain,S extends PersistedEntity,ID extends Serializable,R extends BaseRepository<S,ID>>
extends Object
implements DomainEntityService<T,S,ID,R>
    Abstract domain service implementation.
